Title: Provides Yonkers city school district with additional supplemental education improvement plan funds
Summary: Provides Yonkers city school district with additional supplemental education improvement plan funds equal to the percentage increase between the 2018-2019 and 2019-2020 school years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing the Yonkers city school district with additional supplemental education improvement plan funds
